name: Dead Lead Review Manager
description: Manages the 1-year exclusion period for Dead leads. Sets 'Dead Until' date when entering Dead status, and flags leads as 'Review Eligible' after 1 year. Does NOT auto-return leads to pool - requires manual human decision.
critical_note: Dead leads explicitly opted out. This automation surfaces them for review after 1 year but never auto-contacts them. A human must consciously decide to re-engage.

scenario_1.name: Set Dead Until Date on Status Change
scenario_1.trigger: Status changes to Dead - Negative Reply
scenario_1.action: Set Dead Until to Today + 365 days

scenario_2.name: Daily Check for Review Eligible
scenario_2.action: Find Dead leads where Dead Until < Today, check Review Eligible box

flow_scenario_1.note: Set Dead Until to 1 year from now
Ensure Review Eligible is unchecked (fresh dead lead)

setup_instructions.step_1: Create TWO scenarios in Make.com from this blueprint
setup_instructions.step_2: Scenario 1: 'Dead Lead - Set Date' using flow_scenario_1
setup_instructions.step_3: Scenario 2: 'Dead Lead - Review Check' using flow_scenario_2 (scheduled)
setup_instructions.step_5: Get column IDs for 'dead_until' and 'review_eligible' and update if different
setup_instructions.step_7: Test Scenario 1: Change a lead to 'Dead - Negative Reply', verify Dead Until is set to 1 year out
setup_instructions.step_8: Test Scenario 2: Manually set a lead's Dead Until to yesterday, run scenario, verify Review Eligible checks

when_review_eligible_is_checked: 1. Look at the lead's history in Notes
2. What did they say when they opted out?
3. Was it a soft 'not interested' or hard 'never contact me'?
4. Has anything changed? (new brokerage, market shift, etc.)
5. If appropriate: Uncheck Review Eligible, uncheck Do Not Contact, change Status to New Lead
6. If not appropriate: Leave as-is, add note explaining decision
7. Consider setting Dead Until to another year out if still not appropriate
green_flags_consider_re_engagement: Said 'not right now' vs hard no
Circumstances may have changed (left old brokerage)
Only one opt-out, no repeat issues

monday_view.name: Dead - Ready for Review
monday_view.purpose: Quarterly review queue for Dead leads past their 1-year exclusion
